schemeDates: Recruit twice a year for intakes in September/October and March/April. Accept applications for the March 2017 Intake until 30th September 2016. Assessment Centers take place in September and in November 2016 in Germany or the UK. Closing date for Sept 2017 intake is 31st March 2017.
visaRestrictions: [From the International Graduate Leadership Programme] All nationalities are welcome to apply. The Graduate Programme is open to graduates from around the world. We are very keen to build a strong and diverse team. If required, TUI Group is happy to support you in your work/ residence permit application.

name: UBS
postgradRecruitment:
MBA Programs:
- Summer Associate internships are primarily for MBA candidates between their first and second years of business school.
- Full-time Associate opportunities are primarily offered to recent MBA graduates who have completed a UBS Summer Associate internship.
undergradRecruitment:
Graduate Talent Programmes.
You may only apply for one program/role in one country of your choice during the same academic year. For example, if you wish to apply for the London Graduate Talent Program in Equities, you will not be able to apply for any other program (Graduate Talent Program or Internship) or UBS area (IBD, Operations) in London or elsewhere in EMEA.
schemeDates: 2017 Graduate Program: Application deadline Sunday, 6 November 2016
